author: Austin American-Statesman, Johanna Gretschel, Austin American-Statesman
title: Matthew McConaughey played virtual bingo with a senior living facility amid coronavirus quarantine
description: Matthew McConaughey made a special virtual appearance this weekend at a senior living facility's video conference bingo amid coronavirus quarantine.
content:
